attributes.action: Hold a public enquiry into the polices and running of the RSPCA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: now that the rspca are going to police the new animal welfare law who is going to police them, there is and never has been a watchdog for the rspca,we are not saying that given the right circumstances the rspca can not do a good job but on pass history they need the right direction.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Hold a public enquiry into the polices and running of the RSPCA."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12912.asp

Prime Minister's Office
